General.Name: Ordina N.V.
General.Description: Ordina N.V. provides IT services in the Netherlands, Belgium, and Luxembourg. It engages in the development and implementation of software solutions, as well as designing and managing IT landscapes. The company also provides consulting, technology, and outsourcing services. It serves customers in public, financial services, and industry sectors. Ordina N.V. was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Nieuwegein, the Netherlands.

3.Name: Lieven  Verhaevert
3.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Belgium & Luxembourg
